    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.contento.se:112531</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CFL</catalog>
            <entry>112531</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">The Body 6</string>
            <string language="en">The Body 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Körper 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Corps 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Corpo 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Corpo 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σώμα 6</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Cuerpo 6</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you practise writing the words you have learned in the previous exercises in this part, The Body 1 - 5, at the same time as you practise the indefinite article.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you practice writing the words you have learned in the previous exercises in this party, The Body 1-5, at the same time as you practice the indefinite article. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 3 - How are you?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">body</string>
            <string language="sv">grammar</string>
            <string language="sv">indefinite article</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">body</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="en">indefinite article</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier üben Sie, die Wörter, die Sie in den 
vorhergehenden Übungen in dieser Partei, erlernt haben den 
Körper zu schreiben 1-5, zur gleichen Zeit wie Sie den unbestimmten 
Artikel üben. Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger -
Modul 3 - wie geht es Ihnen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pratiquez écrire les mots que 
vous avez appris dans les exercices précédents en cette partie, le 
corps 1-5, pendant que vous pratiquez l'article indéfini. Safir
- l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 3 - comment 
allez-vous ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pratica escrever as palavras que você
aprendeu nos exercícios precedentes neste partido, o corpo 1-5, ao 
mesmo tempo que você pratica o artigo indefinido. Safir - vida 
do inglês e de funcionamento para novatos - módulo 3 - como é 
você?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui vi esercitate in scrivere le parole che avete
imparato nelle esercitazioni precedenti in questo partito, il corpo 
1-5, nello stesso momento in cui vi esercitate nell'articolo 
indefinito. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per i principianti - 
modulo 3 - come siete?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ ασκείτε τις λέξεις που έχετε μάθει στις 
προηγούμενες ασκήσεις σε αυτό το συμβαλλόμενο μέρος, το σώμα 
1-5, ταυτόχρονα με σας πρακτική το αόριστο άρθρο. Safir - αγγλική και οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους -
ενότητα 3 - πώς είστε;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted practica el escribir de las palabras 
que usted ha aprendido en los ejercicios anteriores en este partido, 
el cuerpo 1-5, al mismo tiempo que usted practica el artículo 
indeterminado. ¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los 
principiantes - módulo 3 - cómo es usted?</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
